text: Deputy Chief Minister of West Bengal is the deputy head of Government of West Bengal.Durga Das Basu. Introduction to the Constitution of India. 1960. 20th Edition, 2011 Reprint. pp. 241, 245. LexisNexis Butterworths Wadhwa Nagpur. . Note: although the text talks about Indian state governments in general, it applies to the specific case of West Bengal as well.. The seat is now vacant since 5 November 2000 after former deputy chief minister Buddhadeb Bhattacharjee.
